description.en: Programming with the Kotlin programming language, UI creation in Android,  Android Application Lifecycle & Permissions Management in Android, Using external libraries and APIs, Writing  Asynchronous Code, Data Storage, Application Architecture (MVVM), Multi-platform Development, Testing Mobile Applications, Overview of iOS platform.
description.et: Programmeerimine Kotlinis, Kasutajaliideste loomine Android, Androidi rakenduste elutsükkel & õiguste haldus, Väliste teekide ja APIde kasutamine, Asünkroonse koodi kirjutamine, Andmete salvestamine, Rakenduse Arhitektuur (MVVM), Multi-platform arendus, Mobiilirakenduste testimine, iOS platvormi ülevaade

objectives.en: This course provides students with a practical introductory overview of mobile application development, mainly on the  Android platform. This involves good practices for creating a pleasant mobile user experience, architectural & software engineering aspects  of developing applications, and integrating mobile applications with external data sources - sensors, APIs, etc.The course aims to provide this knowledge through various practical hands-on assignments, tasks, projects to learn about and gain experience in working on mobile software.
objectives.et: Aine annab sissejuhatava ja praktilise ülevaate mobiilirakenduste arendamisest, keskendudes sealjuures kõige enam Android-platvormile. See hõlmab häid tavasid rakenduste kasutajasõbralikkuse osas, rakenduste arendamise arhitektuurilisi ja tarkvaratehnilisi aspekte; ning mobiilirakenduste integreerimist teiste andmeallikatega nagu andurid, API-d jms. Aine eesmärgiks on anda edasi neid teadmisi praktiliste ülesannete, harjutuste ning projektide kaudu, mis võimaldavad mobiilirakenduste arendamiseks vajalikke oskusi ja kogemusi omandada.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who successfully completes the course:
-Has good knowledge & skills w.r.t. how mobile applications are developed for the Android platform with Kotlin
learning_outcomes.et: -Oskab luua tarkvara Android platvormile Kotlin programmeerimiskeeles

learning_outcomes.en: -Has a basic understanding how applications are developed with cross-platform tools (Flutter, React Native) and on iOS
learning_outcomes.et: -Omab algteadmisi selle kohta, kuidas rakendusi multiplatvorm-tööriistadega (Flutter, React Native) ja iOS platvormil arendada

learning_outcomes.en: -Knows how to ensure a pleasant and privacy-respecting mobile application user experience
learning_outcomes.et: -Teab, kuidas tagada meeldiv ning privaatsust respekteeriv mobiilirakenduse kasutajakogemus

learning_outcomes.en: -Knows how to design mobile systems in terms of software architecture. Is aware of good software engineering practices for code maintainability for Mobile applications
learning_outcomes.et: -Teab, kuidas mobiilisüsteeme arhitektuuriliselt disainida. On tuttav tarkvaratehniliste võtetega, tagamaks mobiilirakenduste  lähtekoodi hallatavust

learning_outcomes.en: -Knows how to ensure mobile application source code quality with automated testing
-Knows how to integrate mobile applications with additional data sources: REST APIs, sensors, location services, etc
learning_outcomes.et: -Teab, kuidsa integreerida mobiilirakendusi väliste andmeallikatega: REST API-d, andurid, asukohateenused, jms

learning_outcomes.en: -Knows how to utilise cloud services, such as compute and storage, for resource-intensive mobile applications
learning_outcomes.et: -Teab, kuidas kasutada ära pilveteenuseid arvutusteks ja andmesalvestuseks ressursinõudlike rakenduste puhul.

independent_work.et: To be announced by the lecturers.

description.et: Team Project: Source code, Presentation, Report - 30%

grade_preconditions.et: A total of at least 51% of points must be earned from the homeworks, tests and team project.

grade_evaluation.et:
The final grade is based directly on the points earned from homeworks, tests, group projects. There is no written examination.
Tests - 10%
Submission of programming homeworks - 60%
Team Project: Source code, Presentation, Report - 30%

debt_elimination.et: Possibility to re-submit missed tasks or improve upon tasks if the student fails initially.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
